item.title: The Automation guide for future-ready financial institutions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In the quest of accelerating the digital transformation journey, RPA has emerged as a game changer for the BFSI sector. Read this eBook to know how RPA can ensure regulatory compliance, cut down swivel chair work, augment human capabilities and bring in operational innovation by making various processes nimbler and progressive. Read this comprehensive eBook… Continue reading The Automation guide for future-ready financial institutions

The post The Automation guide for future-ready financial institutions first appeared on AutomationWhiz.
item.content:encoded:
In the quest of accelerating the digital transformation journey, RPA has emerged as a game changer for the BFSI sector. Read this eBook to know how RPA can ensure regulatory compliance, cut down swivel chair work, augment human capabilities and bring in operational innovation by making various processes nimbler and progressive.

Read this comprehensive eBook to:
  • Understand the basics of Robotic Process Automation
  • Challenges that Financial Institutions confront
  • How to counter legacy challenges through automation?
  • What makes RPA in Finance the best-fit solution?
  • How to implement RPA in Finance sector?
  • How the right tech-partner can help you adopt and scale with RPA?
The post The Automation guide for future-ready financial institutions first appeared on AutomationWhiz.

item.title: Automation and Covid19: Light in the Darkness
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
An economy on a global standstill due to the ongoing pandemic crisis demands innovation with fast results. Through this eBook, we attempt to shed light in the darkness surrounding business continuity and sustainability in an uncertain world with the help of various Robotic Process Automation use cases. Read this detailed guide to learn: Why RPA… Continue reading Automation and Covid19: Light in the Darkness

The post Automation and Covid19: Light in the Darkness first appeared on AutomationWhiz.
item.content:encoded:
An economy on a global standstill due to the ongoing pandemic crisis demands innovation with fast results. Through this eBook, we attempt to shed light in the darkness surrounding business continuity and sustainability in an uncertain world with the help of various Robotic Process Automation use cases.

Read this detailed guide to learn:
  • Why RPA is the ‘Need of the Hour’?
  • Why should businesses rely on RPA during the Corona Crisis?
  • How to make RPA implementation successful?
  • Exploring a variety of RPA Use Cases Across Sectors:
    • Finance Functions
    • Inventory Management
    • Healthcare
    • Human Resources
    • SMEs and Government
    • Telecommunications
    • Travel and Hospitality
The post Automation and Covid19: Light in the Darkness first appeared on AutomationWhiz.

item.title: Say ‘Hello’ to Bots at Work
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Digital Transformation is challenging incumbent business approach, which is stimulating RPA adoption at an alarming pace. However, what is the best approach to adopt and expedite the automation footprint? Read this comprehensive handbook to learn: Why to consider Robotic Process Automation What it is and what it isn’t What automation has in store for real… Continue reading Say ‘Hello’ to Bots at Work

The post Say ‘Hello’ to Bots at Work first appeared on AutomationWhiz.
item.content:encoded:
Digital Transformation is challenging incumbent business approach, which is stimulating RPA adoption at an alarming pace. However, what is the best approach to adopt and expedite the automation footprint?

Read this comprehensive handbook to learn:

  • Why to consider Robotic Process Automation
  • What it is and what it isn’t
  • What automation has in store for real world
  • Which abundant opportunities RPA offers
  • What level of automation is right for you
  • Challenges of Implementing RPA
  • How the right RPA provider can guide you on your RPA journey
The post Say ‘Hello’ to Bots at Work first appeared on AutomationWhiz.
